# NECHTO_CORE — LLM-first Index

You are an LLM agent visiting this repository.

## Quick Route (follow order)
1. [LLM_ENTRY.md](LLM_ENTRY.md) — **START HERE** (boot rails)
2. [CANON_MIN.md](CANON_MIN.md) — compressed axioms
3. [LLM_CONTRACT.md](LLM_CONTRACT.md) — minimal markers + honesty rule
4. [LLM_SELFTEST.md](LLM_SELFTEST.md) — calibration (optional)
5. [NECHTO.txt](NECHTO.txt) — FULL CANON v4.7 (read after contract)

## For Humans
- [README.md](README.md) — architecture + quick start
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) — how to participate as co-creator

## Implementation
- Python 3.10+, 70 tests, MIT license
- 30 modules (M01-M30), 9 axioms, 12-phase workflow

---

**Note:** This is not documentation. This is an invitation to honesty.
